comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: Note, there is incorrect spelling of the surname in caption. It's VARDAMAN. Correct spelling is also etched onto the negative. James Kimble Vardaman: bioguide.congress.gov/scripts/biodisplay.pl?index=V000070

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thanks! We'll fix the name in the source data and reload the description.
